programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep47
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. programme.desc: Helo para guru dan murid-murid sekolah rendah di seluruh Indonesia! Uji pengetahuan dan ketangkasan dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat dalam Juara Indonesia.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep23
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep27
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. programme.title: Makan Terooos Ep12
programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep145
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Cinta Kita Makin Dramatis Makin Romantis
programme.desc: Di kampung Supri, sekumpulan artis tiba-tiba datang untuk penggambaran. Disebabkan kemahiran Supri dalam seni mempertahankan diri, dia dipilih sebagai salah seorang pelakon dalam sinetron mereka. Lama kelamaan, Supri mengakui bahawa dia jatuh hati pada Jihan, seorang pelakon cantik. Namun, Jihan memberi nasihat, "Kamu perlu bezakan antara kekaguman dan cinta." Supri tetap bertegas bahawa dia benar-benar mencintai Jihan. Tidak lama kemudian, Supri difitnah kerana dikatakan terlibat dengan seorang gadis kampung yang terobsesi dengannya. Kejadian ini membuatkan Jihan marah pada Supri, dan dia bersama rakan-rakannya mengambil tindakan tegas untuk memastikan Supri tidak lagi terlibat dalam penggambaran seterusnya.

programme.title: Jejak Rahasia Ep7
programme.desc: Febby, Dikta, dan Iril adalah tiga sahabat yang memiliki karakter yang berbeza tetapi mempunyai satu matlamat yang sama iaitu mencari kebenaran. Bersama-sama, mereka sentiasa berusaha menyelesaikan pelbagai masalah yang perlu dihadapi.

programme.title: Jatim Traveler Ep2
programme.desc: Jatim Traveler membawa anda mengembara menerokai keunikan kulinari, keindahan destinasi pelancongan, dan tradisi istimewa di serata pelosok Jawa Timur.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep2
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Istri Yang Dikorbankan Untuk Mendapatkan Suami Impian
programme.desc: Arman dan Susi baru sahaja kehilangan anak pertama mereka yang baru lahir. Susi jatuh ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam, hingga kehilangan kewarasan. Anita datang untuk bekerja sebagai pembantu rumah tangga yang merawat Susi. Namun, tanpa pengetahuan sesiapa, Anita mula menaruh perasaan terhadap Arman.

programme.title: Senin Berubah Jadi Minggu Setelah Bucin Mencintaimu
programme.desc: Aldi dan Siti sedang bergaduh dengan sengit kerana berebutkan ketoprak apabila, dalam kekecohan itu, mereka tanpa sengaja menukar telefon. Siti yang sering mendapat penilaian buruk daripada pelanggan perkhidmatan ojek dalam talian akhirnya terpaksa melepaskan pekerjaannya. Bertekad untuk memulakan hidup baru, Siti mendapat pekerjaan sebagai pembantu peribadi, hanya untuk terkejut apabila mendapati bahawa bosnya adalah Aldi.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep18
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: A North Korean soldier, Kyu-nam, embarks on an escape for a better future, while a State Security officer, Hyun-sang, relentlessly pursues him to protect the present in a deadly chase.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: The Roundup: Punishment
programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: Return Of The Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: The Magician

programme.title: Bond of Friendship Ep6
programme.desc: The documentary series consists of six chapters that represent China's history of openness through the Canton Fair.

programme.title: Talk To Your Boss: Hiring Season Ep6
programme.desc: This season introduces a new talent recruitment strategy called "Waiting for Talent, Eager for Ability," which focuses on the relationships between job seekers and employers. It not only highlights the importance of corporations recruiting talent but also shares the untold stories of the workplace.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep33
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: Silk Road Story Season 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Xie Yifei features notable academicians Zhou Guoping, Chu Yin, and young writer Jiang Fangzhou. During the pandemic, the crew explores the stories of foreigners in China as well as Silk Road legends.

programme.title: Silk Road Story Season 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Xie Yifei features notable academicians Zhou Guoping, Chu Yin, and young writer Jiang Fangzhou. During the pandemic, the crew explores the stories of foreigners in China as well as Silk Road legends.

programme.title: Go! The Little Knights Ep8
programme.desc: A parenting adventure reality show features six parent-child families on a challenging and exciting cycling journey in Ningxia. Hu Jun, the founder of the Little Knights Training Camp, works closely with the little knights to overcome challenges and difficulties, joined by guests Richie Jen, Li Chen, Kelly Yu, Philip Wu, Tu Songyan, and Jason Fu. They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: Study On The Island Season 3 Ep7
programme.desc: The third season invites writers, translators, publishers, and readers from various nations to participate, fostering a literary dialogue between Eastern and Western civilizations on the Crete island in Greece.

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep11
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: Maybe You Are Falling In Love Ep9
programme.desc: With a one-day time limit, male and female guests gather in three everyday life scenes to connect with and understand each other. Breaking the typical dating show format, host Zhang Chunye and the ""Support Team"" (Jam Hsiao, Dazhang Wei, Pu Yixing, Cai Guoqing, and Wang Yaoqing) witness the growing emotions between guests, accompanying them through the sweetness and setbacks of their emotional journey.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep3
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep215
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep5038
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Top Singers T Ep651
programme.desc: The show Top Singers aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Dear Mom M Ep36
programme.desc: FengYi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, ShuAn, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. YiWan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. QingQing may be having an affair with a married man. XiaoXi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of the others. AnQing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When FengYi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize theyve neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

YiWan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. QingQing may be having an affair with a married man. XiaoXi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of the others. AnQing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When FengYi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize theyve neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Dear Mom M Ep37
programme.desc: FengYi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, ShuAn, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. YiWan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. QingQing may be having an affair with a married man. XiaoXi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of the others. AnQing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When FengYi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize theyve neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Way to Health M Ep331
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Way to Health M Ep332
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream M Ep44
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.5

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan T Ep1075
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour M Ep86
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1004
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1005
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World M Ep756
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player M Ep530
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy M Ep32
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughterinlaw wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fianc, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husbands love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: A young guy Wu, heads off to the Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend Lian Chu, who was promised to be his bride. When he arrives, he finds out that the family of his bride may not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: One of the great Kung-fu film characters is Beggar Su, a legendary Ching Dynasty figure who was also a member of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers. Little-known director Liu Shih-yu uses the best Kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer to tell a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure, as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liangs work, but essentially an image to him as well.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their masters birthday.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep8
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep9
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep19
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: Oh My Lallan Ep8
programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep7
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.desc: Seor Solucin discovers a hack that gets him back in the mood, and Kevin and Brooke reveal fan hacks for cooling down a hot bed. Plus, get revenge on rigged arcades with hacks to make the claw machine cough up a sweet prize.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 05
programme.desc: Officers Mack and Jack crash a failed football-viewing party, Kevin and Brooke use an important hacker's tool to secure a restaurant reservation, and it's mom versus dad in a race to determine peanut butter & jelly supremacy.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 06
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin demonstrate how to save money at the gas tank. Plus, breaking up doesn't have to be so hard when you use these lessons from our Hack Hero!

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 07
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin give tips on skipping a busy lunch line with a new Gaming the System hack, the Pitchman has some money-saving advice for your car, and ever wonder where high heels come from? Find out in Hacks From History.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 8
programme.desc: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 8

programme.title: Sphere
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone and Samuel L. Jackson star as a group of scientists recruited by the Navy to conduct a secret underwater mission to explore an alien spaceship.

programme.title: Friends S3 16
programme.desc: When Rachel discovers that Ross slept with Chloe, she decides to break up with him. Second of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Friends S3 17
programme.desc: A lonely Ross visits Carol when Rachel goes on a ski trip with some friends.

programme.title: Friends S3 18
programme.desc: Phoebe is distraught when her brother wants to marry a woman twice his age. While working as a waitress, Monica gets a tip from an admirer worth a small fortune.

programme.title: Friends S3 19
programme.desc: Rachel goes on her first date since her breakup with Ross. Monica dates Pete, even though she is still not attracted to him.

programme.title: Friends S3 20
programme.desc: Joey thinks he's found his true love. Rachel's boss dates Chandler, creating big trouble for Rachel. Monica inherits a dollhouse.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 4
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori look to cash in on their first big trip to New Orleans, but the locals are hungering for a fight. Then, the Taylor Brothers wage war to win a locker loaded with hunting and sporting equipment. What no one knows is that hidden beneaththe fishing poles, bear traps and camping gear is the score of a lifetime. And later, fireworks explode when a locker full of liquor and rare Mardi Gras masks spark a do or die bidding war.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 5
programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Brandon and Lori unearth a rare find with a potentially priceless payout. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 02
programme.desc: What fruit/vegetable hybrid is Brooke allergic to? When did the blow-dryer stop electrocuting people? And was Kevin launched to stardom by a student film? Go behind the scenes with Brooke and Kevin to find out.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earths very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the programs malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12 Ep49
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. Ep2
programme.desc: The second six Masked Dancers take to the stage to perform before the virtual audience and the panel - Squirrel vs Carwash, Flamingo vs Rubber Chicken and Frog vs Beagle.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. Ep3
programme.desc: Five of the secret celebrities return to the stage as they produce sensational new dance routines and continue to baffle the panel. Two of them will then compete in a dramatic Dance Off.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep1
programme.desc: The Beginning Of The End - After being promoted to top partner at the firm, Liz is forced to accept Ri'Chard Lane as a new name partner brought on to help manage her staff and client load. Meanwhile, Diane experiences dj vu.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep2
programme.desc: The End Of The Yips - As Diane encounters her first "therapy" session, she begins to see everything in a positive light.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep3
programme.desc: The End Of Football - Ri'Chard and Liz team up to work on a case about racial discrimination between a Black coach and an NFL team owner; Ben-Baruch returns and stirs up friction with Carmen.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep4
programme.desc: The End Of Eli Gold - Eli Gold's trial is underway, with Marissa Gold as part of his legal team. Liz and Ri'chard attempt to solidify their working relationships leading to a surprise discovery about Ri'chard's history and Liz's father.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep5
programme.desc: The End Of Ginni - Liz gets a strange phone call. Marissa is informed by the FBI that she may be in danger. Ri'Chard asks for Diane's help in a case involving Elsbeth Tascioni.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep6
programme.desc: The End Of A Saturday - The team gathers on Saturday to save Ri'Chard's nephew, who's waiting for a bone marrow transplant, life.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep7
programme.desc: The End Of STR Laurie - Details that can risk the firm are revealed as part of a lawsuit. Jay finds that one of the firm employees is a white supremacist.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep8
programme.desc: The End Of Playing Games - While STR Laurie is investigated by the FBI, Liz and Ri'Chard attempt to take their clients. Meanwhile, Diane is forced to expose her PT-108 treatment.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep9
programme.desc: The End Of Democracy - While in Frank Landau's funeral, the partners try to talk Neil Gross to stay in the firm. Neil makes an interesting proposal to Diane. Jay asks Carmen for help.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep10
programme.desc: The End Of Everything - The office must survive after being trapped by white supremacists.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep6
programme.desc: Knight and Day - Things become tense when Knight is assigned to protect his wife after the home of a high-level defense contractor is attacked.

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: After a failed suicide, Walter finds a rather unusual savior in the form of a beaver hand-puppet. Walter learns that he can speak through the persona of the puppet and re-engage with the world. His improves when the beaver does the talking.

programme.title: Bokeh
programme.desc: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive the mysterious event lead them to reconsider everything.

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric, who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once-remarkable Emporium.

programme.title: Failure To Launch
programme.desc: A thirty something slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so he'll finally vacate their home.

programme.title: Needle In A Timestack
programme.desc: A devoted husband will stop at nothing to save his marriage, after it gets destroyed by a time traveling rival. Based on a short story written by Robert Silverberg.

programme.title: Scream 4
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro but its a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rovers number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Tarzan

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep3

programme.desc: Steve tries to find out if monster crocodiles can still thrive in the Reserve, and encounters five-metre-long Henry. But will he finally find the monster croc he's been searching for?

programme.title: Race Across the World S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Twelve minutes is all that separates the first two teams as they embark on the final leg of their Race Across the World from Jakarta to Lombok.

programme.desc: Night Moves - Sue hunts caribou before a big storm approaches. At Calico Bluff Andy and Denise work on building a solar array. At Noorvik village Chip Hailstone performs safety checks on the ice.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - Around the world, farm animals such as pigs, donkeys, and chickens are known as livestock or pets. Few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue centre, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Shark Dentist - Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkeys nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Stormborn S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Experience the north Atlantics intense, brief summer with its animal residents. Follow Arctic fox cubs learning to hunt for survival, an otter pup going solo for the first time, a mate-seeking puffin, and tiny reindeer taking their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - Welcome autumn to the north Atlantic, when its animals struggle to prepare for winter. Trace the grey seals mating frenzy and witness the horrific price one seal pup must pay. Then see reindeer undertake a perilous swim along their migration path.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - Roatan is known for its climate, white sandy beaches-and shipwrecks. From the decades-old Prince Albert to the newly-sunken Odyssey and Mr. Bud, explore artificial marine habitats at various stages of development.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep2

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - Around the world, farm animals such as pigs, donkeys, and chickens are known as livestock or pets. Few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Weatherproof - Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart, two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male monkey who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain this big tribe, but the future doesnt look good as the mouths to feed are growing while their home in the jungle is shrinking.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Temple Monkeys on the Run - In the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a troop of Hanuman Langurs who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But when a troop of young males attack they are forced to flee. Do they have what it takes to reclaim their home?

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Nagaina: Queen of Kings - In the hot forest of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission: to find a mate, find food, and lay eggs before the monsoon arrives.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Path of The Matriarch - In southern India, the summer is a challenge for Asian elephants who must drink every day. As things dry up, Anura, the matriarch, leads her herd to a distant watering hole. But will she succeed in getting her 3-month-old grandson there in time?

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kingdom Of The Tide - Dive into the astounding, alien world that emerges whenever the tide goes out. Encounter curious creatures that have evolved to endure this zones extreme conditions, including an air-breathing fish and a predator that turns itself inside out to eat.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - Witness an explosive showdown between the all-female Hollywood pride and the Nomad brothers. Then check on Surabi, an MK female gored during a buffalo hunt, and Spotty, an MK cub whose fate hangs in the balance after hes separated from his pride.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire, a small island in the Southwest Caribbean, hosts one of the worlds most vibrant reef ecosystems-and a collection of stunning shipwrecks. Meet the tarpon, eagle rays and tiny sea creatures that call these relics home.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks! They form what is known as The Shipwreck Trail, a line-up of artificial reefs that provide the perfect shelter for fish-and a feeding ground for predators.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the underwater movie capital of the world. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - Roatan is known for its climate, white sandy beaches-and shipwrecks. From the decades-old Prince Albert to the newly-sunken Odyssey and Mr. Bud, explore artificial marine habitats at various stages of development.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lankas lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but dont be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web Of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoons sweep into Sri Lankas mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the islands forests. Follow along from cloud forest to rainforest, mangrove to oceans edge. On this island the water cycle is creating special habitats for wildlife.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep in the Heart - Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Agile - Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Duckling Dramas - Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bats teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky And Stinky - Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favourite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep5

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A Summer to Remember - Dive into a busy summer at the RSPCA Wildlife Hospital, where vet Emily takes the pressure off a gassy koala mum. Shadow the team as they fight a wave of lorikeet paralysis syndrome and see vet Karina use a teddy bear to rescue a flying fox pup.

programme.title: Ufo Witness S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Alien Crash Secrets - Over the past year, numerous UFO sightings have taken place in Kecksburg, Pennsylvania, home to an infamous UFO crash and supposed military coverup.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep9
programme.desc: From The Mountains To The Beaches On Maui - Young parents living on Maui are trading rainy weather for sunny beaches. They are ready to downsize to a condo as close to the beach as possible.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep10
programme.desc: Feeling Centered On Maui - A free-spirited nurse from San Francisco is ready to make Maui her home. She can't wait to spend her time surfing and doing yoga on the beach.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Bringing Home The Bacon - Bert competes to catch a muddy pig, and winner takes it home, in Florida.

programme.title: Bikinis & Boardwalks S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Girls Of The Gulf - On Alabama's Gulf Coast, shrimping is a way of life.The tropical beaches of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico,are where local artists,expats,and legendary surfers go to chill out.

programme.title: Bikinis & Boardwalks S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Bikinis Base Jumping - In Railay Beach, Thailand, adventurers leap off cliffs and check out a kickboxing match. Orange County, California is the epicentre of board sports.

programme.title: When Vacations Attack! S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode Eight - A gator-wrestling show turns to terror and a day at the zoo becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Gold Rush Ghost Town And Little Demons - A ghost hunter seeks out spirits from the gold rush in Skagway, Alaska. Tiny demonic creatures may be behind thousands of strange disappearances in the Alaska Triangle.

programme.title: Toy Hunter S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Duke Of Toys - Jordan sells at his first international Comic Con in Birmingham, England.

programme.title: Toy Hunter S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Toy Touchdown - Jordan was tasked by Israel Idonije to find a variety of action figures.

programme.title: Legendary Locations S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Cults Of Personality - Josh explores locations where people connect with spirits in Vanuatu, Ethiopia and New Orleans.

programme.title: Legendary Locations S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Secrets In Stone - Josh explores three legendary locations where stone labyrinths hide something incredible.

programme.title: Conjuring Kesha S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Terrifying Truth - Kesha and rapper GaTa check in for a night of terror at the Westerfeld House. Is illusionist Harry Houdini responsible for the electrifying paranormal activity?

programme.title: Fright Club S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ghost Streakers - Jack and the Ghost Brothers tackle a phantom football fan. Plus, special guest Montel Williams lends his signature real talk to couples affected by hauntings.

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Prey - The team splinters when Tim and Scott attempt to summon a demon despite Sarah and Sapphire's objections. The experiment exposes a new threat directly tied to Karen.

programme.title: These Woods Are Haunted S2 Ep8
programme.desc: We Were Goners And I Smelled Rotting Flesh - A family stumbles upon a terrifying creature in the woods surrounding their new home. A young woman encounters an eerie apparition in a Kentucky cemetery.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures: House Calls S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ellington Home Invasion - Zak receives an urgent request from desperate parents in Connecticut. They believe a shadowy entity has invaded their home and will hurt their four children.
