programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep20
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus / Furricane - When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep23
programme.desc: The King Who Would Be King - Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep12
programme.desc: Full House / Gift Express - Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Edens fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harpers family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Portrait of Hiccup as a Buff Man - Believing his father is disappointed in him, Hiccup sets out on a dangerous treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Dragon Flower - After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep30
programme.desc: Tea Time Trouble - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep13
programme.desc: The Glitter Guide / Piano Panic - When the Dews find out their glitter guide (an older Dew Drop) is coming to visit, they bend over backwards to make a great first impression, but end up forgetting some of their responsiblities in the process. / When a string breaks on Marcus piano before his recital and he cant practice, the Dews must lead Marcus to a new piano.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep13
programme.desc: Sea Monsters / Puff Fruit - Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep21
programme.desc: Monkey Planet - King Julien declares that lemurs will land on the moon and seeks help from a former astronaut: Stanislav, the Russian Space Monkey.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep22
programme.desc: True Bromance - When King Julien discovers that Maurice is moonlighting as adviser to another king, the two best friends break up.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep23
programme.desc: The King Who Would Be King - Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep26
programme.desc: King Juli-End - King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep28
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 2 - As Mort and Clover search for their leader, King Julien shows off his pirate booty moves and convinces the pirates he should be captain of the ship.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep13
programme.desc: Star - Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains its up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ Its Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Sock - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep165
programme.desc: Mysterious Visitor - Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. He is amazed when he and Ron discover two glowing eyes. It must be the space alien!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops / Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking. // Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Dino Cake - Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The Trophy Chase - The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Clover Builds a Trap / Bagpipe Battle - Clover builds an elaborate Flea Beast defense system and accidentally traps the hamsters. // The hamsters think Harry's new bagpipes are a noisy beast that is attacking their king.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers / Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat. // Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Pups Save a High-Flying Hen / Pups Save a Sloth - After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue her. // Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Pups Save Ryder - Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded and drops his Pup Pad!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds a Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk! // When Farmer Zoe's animals need some relaxation, the pups build a perfect place to practice yoga with Coach Karima.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Isa's Royal Garden Party / Sammy's Surprise - The Queen of Reptiles is visiting Isa, but the garden's a mess! Dora helps her get everything ready in time for La Reina's visit. / Dora meets Sammy the Sloth, who needs to get to Day Camp on time so he can show everyone a special surprise.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Lannie's Lights - When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Dinner with Bentley - The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Ceviche for Dinner - When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Surf's Up, Sharkdog! - When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.desc: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift - Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Mission Ham-Possible / Vac Attack! - The hamsters thwart Kendrick and Harry's attempts to squirrel-proof the bird feeder. // When a robovac gobbles up Harry's prized trading card, the hamsters vow to retrieve it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble at the Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep909
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Save the Bridge - Ryder and the Pups team up with Al to save Adventure Bay's big bridge from collapsing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep910
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Save a Sliding Chalet / Big Truck Pups Save a Really Big Dish - When Mayor Humdinger's mountain vacation literally goes downhill, it's up to the Pups to stop Jake's Chalet before it crashes. // Mayor Humdinger messes with the satellite dish and downs a satellite and the town's communication systems.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep911
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Save the Swiped Speakers / Big Truck Pups Save the Big Big Pipes - When Mayor Humdinger hijacks Al's rig carrying Luke Stars and his equipment, it's up to the Big Truck Pups to rescue him. // When Al's load of big pipes breaks loose, it's up to the Big Truck Pups to save their friends from the rolling hazards.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples - Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep218
programme.desc: A Star Fish Is Born - When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Sharknapped! - When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash - The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Doctor Drama / The White Whale - After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun - Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back. // The sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud so Sol can set.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Turon / Matzo Ball Soup - When the Stump receives a delivery of an unknown fruit, Detectives Chef and Olly must solve the mystery of what it is before they can cook it. // When the gang gets the sneezles, it's up to Olly to finish the matzo ball soup without an exact recipe.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Sharkdog Sitting - While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Fish Fiesta Freakout - Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Sharkdog, Family - When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Dumplings - Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.desc: J - Dee encourages a friend to say 'j', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We wear some jumpers, ride on a jumbo jet and see a jaguar in a jungle!

programme.desc: Terracotta Army, China - Can the Go Jetters stop Glitch's noisy guitar and save the Terracotta Army in China?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Helicopter - At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.desc: J - Dee encourages a friend to say 'j', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We wear some jumpers, ride on a jumbo jet and see a jaguar in a jungle!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Howdy There Hooper - The friends want Hooper to be the sheriff of Pop Paper City and make him a hobby horse.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Fossil Puzzle - In the real world, Messy is bored of his dino-jigsaw. In OKIDO, his friends help him piece together a real prehistoric puzzle!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Treehouse Badge - Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the Squirrels take refuge in the treehouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep6
programme.desc: The Fossil Badge - The Squirrels are digging in the garden when they come across a fossil.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Footprint Badge - The Squirrels are playing hide-and-seek, but they can't find Happy.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep19

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Terracotta Army, China - Can the Go Jetters stop Glitch's noisy guitar and save the Terracotta Army in China?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep26

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Helicopter - At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep17

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep13

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep2

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep52

programme.desc: UFC Connected "Unbreakable: Mullarkey x Pearson, Fighter Focus: Jack Jenkins, On Point: Aussie MMA, Day One: Jack Della Maddalena - Delve into the unbreakable bond between UFC veteran Ross Pearson and Australias up and coming lightweight Jamie Mullarkey. Jack Phar Jenkins details his aggressive style in his run up to the UFC to prove hes anything but a One Trick Pony. programme.title: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.
